attributes.title: The Greatest Kingdom
attributes.caption: Our heroes have finally made it to Atlas, but are they truly as safe as they’d hoped? This shining city in the clouds may be a beacon of hope for Remnant, but it casts a dark shadow…
attributes.description: Our heroes have finally made it to Atlas, but are they truly as safe as they’d hoped? This shining city in the clouds may be a beacon of hope for Remnant, but it casts a dark shadow…

attributes.title: A New Approach
attributes.caption: Arresting people isn’t exactly the best way to make a first impression. However, once the initial shock has worn off, Ruby and her friends learn there’s a lot more to these Ace Ops - and even General Ironwood - than first meets the eye.
attributes.description: Arresting people isn’t exactly the best way to make a first impression. However, once the initial shock has worn off, Ruby and her friends learn there’s a lot more to these Ace Ops - and even General Ironwood - than first meets the eye.

attributes.title: Ace Operatives
attributes.caption: Out in the snowy tundra, the Ace Ops show teams RWBY and JNR the ropes.
attributes.description: Out in the snowy tundra, the Ace Ops show teams RWBY and JNR the ropes.

attributes.title: Pomp and Circumstance
attributes.caption: Riding the high of completing their first mission in Atlas, the gang is itching to hone their skills and provide some much-needed help to the citizens of Mantle.
attributes.description: Riding the high of completing their first mission in Atlas, the gang is itching to hone their skills and provide some much-needed help to the citizens of Mantle.

attributes.title: Sparks
attributes.caption: Between missions, training, and rising political unrest, these fledgling huntsmen and huntresses have quite a lot on their hands.
attributes.description: Between missions, training, and rising political unrest, these fledgling huntsmen and huntresses have quite a lot on their hands.

attributes.title: A Night Off
attributes.caption: After constant missions and vigorous training sessions, the kids finally get a night off to relax! But attending a political rally may not be the most leisurely activity.
attributes.description: After constant missions and vigorous training sessions, the kids finally get a night off to relax! But attending a political rally may not be the most leisurely activity.

attributes.title: Worst Case Scenario
attributes.caption: How far would you be willing to go to do what's right?
attributes.description: How far would you be willing to go to do what's right?

attributes.title: Cordially Invited
attributes.caption: Jacques and Ironwood engage in a dangerous game of wits. Meanwhile, the kids must face their most dangerous threat yet: a high class dinner party.
attributes.description: Jacques and Ironwood engage in a dangerous game of wits. Meanwhile, the kids must face their most dangerous threat yet: a high class dinner party.

attributes.title: As Above, So Below
attributes.caption: Will you tell the truth? Or will someone tell it for you? The answer can make all the difference in the world.
attributes.description: Will you tell the truth? Or will someone tell it for you? The answer can make all the difference in the world.

attributes.title: Out in the Open
attributes.caption: The truth is finally out, and it's not only our heroes who take notice. With everything at stake, it's all hands on deck to protect the City of Mantle.
attributes.description: The truth is finally out, and it's not only our heroes who take notice. With everything at stake, it's all hands on deck to protect the City of Mantle.

attributes.title: Gravity
attributes.caption: Between Watts, Tyrian, and the seemingly endless swarm of Grimm, evil is encroaching on our heroes from all sides. The biggest threat, however, may be hiding where they least expect it.
attributes.description: Between Watts, Tyrian, and the seemingly endless swarm of Grimm, evil is encroaching on our heroes from all sides. The biggest threat, however, may be hiding where they least expect it.

attributes.title: With Friends Like These
attributes.caption: With Salem's forces drawing closer, and the General's orders for their arrest, our heroes are forced to fight on all fronts to save the city Ironwood has abandoned.
attributes.description: With Salem's forces drawing closer, and the General's orders for their arrest, our heroes are forced to fight on all fronts to save the city Ironwood has abandoned.

attributes.title: The Enemy of Trust
attributes.caption: Who will you become when your greatest fears are realized?
attributes.description: Who will you become when your greatest fears are realized?
